channel.title: Cybersecurity News Aggregator
channel.description: Latest cybersecurity news from top sources
channel.comment: News aggregated from: Krebs on Security, The Hacker News, Threatpost, Bleeping Computer, Dark Reading, ZDNet Security

item.title: British hacker 'IntelBroker' charged with $25M in cybercrime damages
item.description: A British national known online as "IntelBroker" has been charged by the U.S. for stealing and selling sensitive data from dozens of victims, causing an estimated $25 million in damages. [...]...

item.title: Hackers turn ScreenConnect into malware using Authenticode stuffing
